outcome_brief.statement: Move Adventurer Guild from mock data to live saved progress that works reliably.

quest_chains.name: Adventurer Guild: Backend Foundation
quest_chains.description: Set up the core backend pieces so the game can save and load real progress.

steps.title: Create Save Data Tables
steps.description: Prepare the database so player and quest progress can be stored safely.
steps.goal: Make sure the game can store guild, adventurer, quest, run, and save-slot data.
player_steps: Create the core migration files for save data.
Run migrations in a clean environment.
Run rollback once to prove recovery works.
done_when: Migration runs successfully.
Rollback runs successfully.
Schema map is attached in the proof.

rs_brief.context: Backend migration layer and gameplay persistence schema.
rs_brief.constraints: No breaking rename on existing stable tables.
rs_brief.suggested_prompt: Help me create safe migrations for Adventurer Guild save data with up/down SQL and rollback checks.

steps.title: Publish API Contract Guide
steps.description: Define what data the frontend and backend expect from each other.
steps.unlock_condition: Q1 complete and schema map approved.
steps.goal: Lock down API contracts for the core read and write game actions.
player_steps: List the core endpoints with sample request and response payloads.
Add error response examples for failed cases.
Get sign-off from frontend and backend owners.
done_when: Contract guide exists for six endpoints.
Each endpoint has success and error examples.
Frontend and backend owners approve the guide.

rs_brief.context: API contract docs for guild summary, roster, quest list, assign, resolve, save/load.
rs_brief.constraints: Keep one previous contract version valid during cutover.
rs_brief.suggested_prompt: Draft versioned API contract documentation with JSON examples and validation rules for these endpoints.

steps.title: Ship Read APIs
steps.description: Build the read-only APIs needed by the guild home flow.
steps.goal: Enable live backend reads for guild summary, roster, and available quests.
player_steps: Implement the three read endpoints.
Add tests for normal and edge cases.
Capture latency results with seeded data.
done_when: All three read endpoints return correct data.
Tests pass for expected and invalid inputs.
P95 read latency is at or below 300ms in test run.

rs_brief.constraints: Do not depend on mock data in the route path.
rs_brief.suggested_prompt: Generate a checklist to implement and test three read endpoints with latency measurement steps.

steps.title: Ship Write APIs
steps.description: Build the write APIs for assigning and finishing quests plus save/load.
steps.unlock_condition: Q1-Q3 complete and API contracts frozen.
steps.goal: Enable reliable backend writes for the full gameplay loop.
player_steps: Implement assign quest, resolve quest, save game, and load game routes.
Validate payloads and expected failures.
Run negative tests to verify no unhandled crashes.
done_when: All four write routes are live.
Invalid payloads return safe errors.
Negative test run shows zero unhandled exceptions.

rs_brief.constraints: Writes must be idempotent where retries can happen.
rs_brief.suggested_prompt: Help me design robust validation and idempotent handling for four write endpoints with failure-case tests.

quest_chains.name: Adventurer Guild: Cutover Readiness
quest_chains.description: Move the frontend to live APIs and make release operations safe.

steps.title: Connect Frontend to Live APIs
steps.description: Replace core-loop mock data with real API calls.
steps.unlock_condition: Q3 and Q4 are merged to main.
steps.goal: Run the core loop on backend data instead of mocks.
player_steps: Replace mock imports in core-loop pages.
Handle loading and error states for API calls.
Verify key screens work with live responses.
done_when: Core-loop pages have zero mock imports.
Users can complete the core flow using API data.
Screenshots are attached for key states.

rs_brief.context: Frontend stores/hooks/services for core gameplay pages.
rs_brief.constraints: Preserve existing UX states while swapping data source.
rs_brief.suggested_prompt: Create a migration checklist to replace mock adapters with API clients in React stores and hooks.

steps.title: Stabilize Save and Load
steps.description: Protect players from bad save payloads and recovery failures.
steps.unlock_condition: Q4 complete so save payload shape is stable.
player_steps: Add payload guards for save and load.
Support fallback behavior for older or invalid data.
Run five save/load reliability scenarios.
done_when: All five reliability scenarios pass.
Invalid payloads do not crash the game.
Recovery path is documented and tested.

rs_brief.context: Save/load validation, fallback handlers, and compatibility shim.
rs_brief.constraints: Keep existing save format readable during transition.
rs_brief.suggested_prompt: Design a save/load validation matrix with fallback handling and tests for invalid payload recovery.

steps.title: Add Full-Loop Integration Tests
steps.description: Cover the complete recruit-to-reload loop with integration tests.
steps.unlock_condition: Core read/write flow is available for end-to-end tests.
steps.goal: Prevent regressions in the core gameplay loop.
player_steps: Add integration tests for recruit, assign, resolve, save, and reload.
Hook the suite into CI.
Track and reduce flaky test behavior.
done_when: At least 8 integration tests are passing.
CI blocks merges when this suite fails.
Flake rate is at or below 2%.

rs_brief.context: Integration harness and CI gating rules.
rs_brief.constraints: Tests must run consistently in CI without manual prep.
rs_brief.suggested_prompt: Propose an integration test suite structure and CI gate for an end-to-end gameplay loop.

steps.title: Publish Runbooks
steps.description: Write and test runbooks for deploy, rollback, incidents, and data restore.
steps.goal: Make release support repeatable for the team.
player_steps: Write deploy, rollback, incident, and restore runbooks.
Run one dry-run using the runbooks.
Capture any gaps and patch the docs.
done_when: Four runbooks are published.
One dry run is completed.
Runbook fixes from dry run are merged.

rs_brief.context: Operational docs and request tracing setup.
rs_brief.constraints: Runbooks must be short and executable by non-authors.
rs_brief.suggested_prompt: Help me produce concise deploy/rollback/incident/restore runbooks with a dry-run checklist.

raids.name: Raid: Backend Cutover v1
raids.description: Team release event to launch the backend cutover safely.
go_no_go_gates: Core route error rate < 1% during observation

steps.title: Phase 1: Final Checks
steps.description: Run final tests and make go/no-go decision.
steps.unlock_condition: Raid entry criteria must be met.
steps.goal: Confirm release candidate is safe to launch.
player_steps: Run full regression suite.
Review all gate results.
Publish go/no-go decision record.
done_when: All release gates pass.
Decision record is published.
Stakeholders are informed.

rs_brief.constraints: No launch if any gate fails.
rs_brief.suggested_prompt: Generate a release go/no-go checklist with evidence links and decision log format.

steps.title: Phase 2: Staged Rollout
steps.description: Roll out in a staged environment and monitor for 24 hours.
steps.goal: Verify stability under live-like conditions before production.
player_steps: Deploy staged rollout build.
Monitor errors, latency, and save/load health.
Log and resolve incidents during observation.
done_when: 24-hour observation window completes.
Error and latency stay within gates.
Incident log is complete.

rs_brief.constraints: Rollback must remain ready during full observation period.
rs_brief.suggested_prompt: Build a 24-hour staged rollout runbook with checkpoints and rollback triggers.

steps.title: Phase 3: Production Launch
steps.description: Launch to production, tag release, and publish report.
steps.goal: Complete cutover and leave a clear evidence trail.
player_steps: Execute production cutover steps.
Create release tag and notes.
Publish what-shipped and postmortem draft.
done_when: Production release is live.
Release tag and notes are published.
Postmortem draft is shared.

rs_brief.context: Production launch checklist and post-release reporting.
rs_brief.constraints: Keep rollback path available until verification closes.
rs_brief.suggested_prompt: Create a production cutover checklist with release-tag/report requirements and rollback guardrails.

bosses.name: Contract Drift Hydra
bosses.description: Frontend and backend data contracts can drift during cutover.
bosses.rollback_plan: Freeze contract version and route traffic to previous stable payload version.
kill_criteria: 0 runtime contract mismatch errors in staging for 48h
hp_tasks: HP1: Contract spec published and versioned
HP4: Compatibility check for one previous contract version
HP5: Contract tests block merges on failure

bosses.name: Save Corruption Wraith
bosses.description: Invalid save payloads can break loading and player progress.
bosses.rollback_plan: Disable affected save version and restore last known good snapshot.
hp_tasks: HP6: Broken fixture save verification complete
HP7: Patched loader deployed to staging
